dataList.name: 1st Anniversary Pack
dataList.desc:
A limited 1st Anniversary Pack. Contains the following items:

· Immediate access to Angela Announcer
· 3★ Guarantee Decaextraction Ticket x1
· Identity Takeoff Ticket x1

※ If you have already obtained the Angela Announcer, acquire x50 Thread Crates instead.
※ Identity Takeoff Ticket raises an Identity’s level to up to 40, and Uptie Tier up to Tier 4.

dataList.name: Limbus Pass
dataList.desc:
Upgrades the Battle Pass into the Limbus Pass.

※ Only applies for the current season’s pass.
